Bahtera Organic Farm

Only Deliver High Quality Products

OUR SERVICES

PROFESSIONALS BUTCHER

Our butchers know how to cut every slice of meat. We offers a variety of cuts even the cut technique of rare steak. We offer AMERICAN WAGYU, KUROBOTA.

VARIETY PACKAGING

We provides several packaging: vacuum seal, tray, box packaging, and frozen raw meat. Each package goes through a strict meat hygiene selection. We don't want to give our customers bad experiences.

DIGITAL ORDERING

Give our customer best experience easy to get our products. Fast solution for looking best quality meats. We enable our delivery with tracking mode for every transaction. Just wait for your order !

ABOUT US

Bahtera organic was a small family farm at beginning. Bahtera Yokino was the 9th generation of family who rise the this small farm into largest best meat supplier. Over 30 years Bahtera serving the best quality and cleanliness for many popular restaurants.

Bahtera has professional chefs and butchers. We offer cutting technique for each meat slices give our customer best experiences. We provide unique packaging for hygiene products, la carte boxing and free gift for our customer. To strengthen relationships we open our farm for education purpose.

Today we open our order by online systems. Fast order, better and easy service. We build our ordering with tracking system. You can monitor your order realtime.
